title: Create Interview with Job Description
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description in the provided text area
Click the 'Save' button
Verify that the AI suggests questions based on the job description
expected_result: The AI suggests relevant questions based on the job description

title: Use Enhanced JD Feature
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job title (e.g. '2-year experienced JavaScript developer with AWS experience')
Click the 'Use Enhanced JD' button
Verify that the AI generates a complete job description
expected_result: The AI generates a complete job description based on the job title

title: Edit and Save Job Description
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description in the provided text area
Edit the job description
Click the 'Save' button
Verify that the edited job description is saved
expected_result: The edited job description is saved successfully

title: View and Select Skill Recommendations
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description in the provided text area
Click the 'Save' button
Verify that the AI suggests key skills based on the job description
Select one or more of the suggested skills
expected_result: The selected skills are saved and displayed

title: Configure Question Difficulty Level
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description in the provided text area
Click the 'Save' button
Verify that the AI suggests questions based on the job description
Configure the difficulty level of the questions (e.g. 'Hard', 'Moderate')
expected_result: The difficulty level of the questions is configured successfully

title: Create Interview with Standard and Role-Based Questions
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description in the provided text area
Click the 'Save' button
Verify that the AI suggests standard and role-based questions
Configure the questions as desired (e.g. personalize options, add preferred answers)
expected_result: The interview is created with the configured questions

title: Create Interview with Unique Public Link
steps: Visit the interview creation page
Enter a job description in the provided text area
Click the 'Save' button
Verify that the interview is created with a unique public link
expected_result: The interview is created with a unique public link

title: Candidates Video Interview Submission
steps: Visit the responses tab
Find the candidate's video interview response
Verify the structured answers and video recordings are available
expected_result: The candidate's video interview response is successfully submitted and viewable

title: Interview Score and Communication Score
steps: Visit the interview screenings section
Find the candidate's interview score and communication score
Verify the scores are displayed
expected_result: The candidate's interview score and communication score are displayed

title: Comprehensive Interview Summary
steps: Visit the interview screenings section
Find the comprehensive interview summary
Verify the summary includes observations, positives, and negatives
expected_result: The comprehensive interview summary is displayed with observations, positives, and negatives

title: Action Button to Select or Reject Candidate
steps: Visit the interview screenings section
Find the action button to select or reject the candidate
Verify the button is clickable
expected_result: The action button to select or reject the candidate is available and clickable

title: Résumé Screening and AI Score
steps: Create an interview and upload a set of résumés
Verify the AI commences the screening process
Find the résumé score assigned by the AI
expected_result: The AI assigns a résumé score based on the candidate's skills and experience

title: AI Recommendations for Next Stage
steps: Visit the résumé screening section
Find the AI's recommendation for the next stage
Verify the recommendation is based on the candidate's suitability for the job
expected_result: The AI provides a recommendation for the next stage based on the candidate's suitability for the job

title: Sending Interview Link to Candidate
steps: Decide to proceed with a candidate
Send the interview link to the candidate
Verify the link is valid for 24 hours
expected_result: The interview link is sent to the candidate and is valid for 24 hours

title: Initiating Interview Screening Process
steps: Wait for the candidate to submit their interview
Initiate the interview screening process
Verify the summary is available for review
expected_result: The interview screening process is initiated and the summary is available for review
